articles.author: Dylan Horetski
articles.title: Marques Brownlee goes hands-on with Apple Vision Pro headset in unboxing video - Dexerto
articles.description: Tech YouTuber Marques 'MKBHD' Brownlee has finally shown off the Apple Vision Pro in one of the first in-depth unboxings.
articles.content:
Marques MKBHD Brownlee has gone hands-on with the Apple Vision Pro headset and its handful of accessories in his latest unboxing video. 
Since being first revealed back in 2023, the Apple Vision Pro… [+1838 chars]
